Package org.openpreservation.odf.pkg

Interface OdfPackage

public interface OdfPackage

  • Method Details

    • getName

      String getName()
      Get the name/identifier of the package, often the path to the file parsed.
      Returns:
      the name of the package

    • getDetectedFormat

      Formats getDetectedFormat()
      Get the detected format of the package. This is the format detected by format sniffing and may not be the actual ODF type depending on any MIMETYPE entry in the package.
      Returns:
      the detected format of the package

    • isWellFormedZip

      boolean isWellFormedZip()
      Is the item parsed a well formed ODF Package, i.e. is is a ZIP archive with wellformed XML documents.
      Returns:
      true if the package is well formed, otherwise false

    • getMimeType

      String getMimeType()
      Get the declared mimetype of the package. This is the mimetype declared in the MIMETYPE entry and/or manifest root entry. This may differ from the detected format.
      Returns:
      the declared mimetype of the package

    • hasMimeEntry

      boolean hasMimeEntry()
      Does the package have a MIMETYPE entry?
      Returns:
      true if the package has a MIMETYPE entry, otherwise false

    • isMimeFirst

      boolean isMimeFirst()
      Is the MIMETYPE entry the first entry in the package?
      Returns:
      true if the MIMETYPE entry is the first entry in the package, otherwise false

    • hasManifest

      boolean hasManifest()
      Does the package have a manifest?
      Returns:
      true if the package has a manifest, otherwise false

    • hasThumbnail

      boolean hasThumbnail()
      Does the package have a preview image thumbnail?
      Returns:
      true if the package has a thumbnail preview, otherwise false

    • getZipArchive

      ZipArchive getZipArchive()
      Returns the details of the underlying ZIP archive for the package as a ZipArchive instance.
      Returns:
      the package ZIP archive

    • getManifest

      Manifest getManifest()
      Get the Manifest object for the package, this is parsed as long as the Manifest file is a well formed XML document.
      Returns:
      the package Manifest

    • getEntryXmlStream

      InputStream getEntryXmlStream(String path) throws IOException
      Get the InputStream to any of an identified ODF XML document in the package
      Parameters:
      path - the internal path to the XML document
      Returns:
      the InputStream to the XML document
      Throws:
      IOException - when there's a problem reading the entry

    • getEntryXmlParseResult

      ParseResult getEntryXmlParseResult(String path)
      Get the XML ParseResult of and identified ODF XML documents in the package
      Parameters:
      path - the internal path to the XML document
      Returns:
      the InputStream to the XML document
      Throws:
      IOException - when there's a problem reading the entry

    • getXmlEntryPaths

      List<String> getXmlEntryPaths()
      Get the paths to all of the identified ODF XML documents in the package, including content, styles, metadata and the manifest
      Returns:
      a List of all of the String internal paths to the packge ODF XML documents

    • getXmlEntries

      Set<FileEntry> getXmlEntries()
      Get the paths to all of the identified ODF XML documents in the package, including content, styles, metadata and the manifest
      Returns:
      a List of all of the String internal paths to the packge ODF XML documents

    • getEntryStream

      InputStream getEntryStream(FileEntry entry) throws IOException
      Get the InputStream for any item from the document's Manifest
      Parameters:
      entry - the Manifest FileEntry to get the InputStream for
      Returns:
      the InputStream for the entry supplied
      Throws:
      IOException - when there's a problem reading the entry

    • getDocument

      OdfPackageDocument getDocument()
      Get the OdfDocument for the package, this is the root document of the ODF Package
      Returns:
      the root document of the ODF Package

    • getDocumentMap

      Map<String,OdfPackageDocument> getDocumentMap()
      Get the Map of OdfDocument objects for the package, this is the root document of the ODF Package
      Returns:
      the Map of OdfDocument Sub-Documents for the package.

    • getSubDocument

      OdfPackageDocument getSubDocument(String path)
      Get the OdfDocument for any sub-document in the package.
      Parameters:
      path - the internal path to the sub-document
      Returns:
      the OdfDocument for the sub-document

    • getMetaInfMap

      Map<String,ParseResult> getMetaInfMap()
      Retrieve the Map of String path keys and ParseResult values for files below the META-INF directory.
      Returns:
      the Map of META-INF file parse results.

    • hasDsigEntries

      boolean hasDsigEntries()
      Returns true if the META-INF directory or sub-directories contain files with the term "signatures" in their name.
      Returns:
      the Map of META-INF file parse results.
